## Source: ossf-package-analysis (84c0c5c0b7b15c71cf234a3d2a1e6cff68b3c2f61f610b7c2ef9fd0da6736394)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@shadowmonarchx/eslint_plugin_react' @ 7.29.6 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
